personal_info.name: Sunil Rana
personal_info.about_me: I am a passionate software engineer who loves building smart web applications using modern technologies. I specialize in creating websites that can predict health issues and analyze data automatically. I enjoy solving real-world problems through coding and machine learning.

what_i_do.specialization: Full Stack Web Development + Machine Learning
what_i_do.description: I build complete web applications from frontend to backend, and also create AI models that can predict things like heart disease. I make websites that are fast, secure, and easy to use.
key_strengths: Building websites with React and Node.js

heart_iq.name: HEART IQ - Health Prediction App
heart_iq.what_it_does: A website that can predict heart disease risk using artificial intelligence
heart_iq.how_it_helps: Doctors and patients can check heart health risk quickly without complex tests

excel_analytics.name: EXCEL ANALYTICS - Data Analysis Tool
excel_analytics.what_it_does: A platform that automatically analyzes Excel files and creates smart reports
excel_analytics.how_it_helps: Businesses can upload Excel files and get instant insights without manual work

what_i_did: Built features for data analysis platform
Created file upload system for Excel files
Made charts and graphs for data visualization
zidio.skills: React, Node.js, MongoDB, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 , Java , Docker

masters.college: Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering, Bangalore

achievements_simple: Built AI projects that solve real health problems
